Import Users Plugin by Jenil

1. Upload import-users.zip via WP Admin → Plugins → Add New → Upload.
2. Activate the plugin.
3. Go to Admin Menu → Import Users.
4. Select one or more CSV/XML files and click Import.
5. Watch the live progress and view import history below.

*Duplicates (existing email/username) are skipped.*
*Passwords auto-generated if missing.*
*Batch size: 500 rows.*
